description: Non-Material Amendment under Section 96A of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 to vary the wording of condition 29 [external ductwork] of planning permission ref: P2013/2704/S73 dated 17/04/14. The amendment would allow the details to be submitted prior to superstructure stage rather than pre-commencement
decision_conditions:
CONDITION 29 of planning permission reference: P2013/2704/S73 is amended to read: Notwithstanding the external ductwork shown on drawings MP100 P04, MP102 - P117 P04, MP P241 P05, MP243 P05, MPP301 - P302 P05 and within the Section 73 Design and Access Statement dated 12 July 2013 details of any external ductwork and/or shafts shall be submitted and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of superstructure works.

The details will fully explore locating all ductwork internal to the building. The Local Planning Authority will expect all opportunities for internal location of any flue or ductwork essential.

Any ductwork shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON:  In the interest of securing sustainable development and to ensure that the resulting appearance and construction of the development is of a high standard.
